question: The main event of 4th International Yoga Day celebrations to be held at which place?
explanation: The main event of 4th International Yoga Day celebrations will be held at Dehradun in Uttrakhand on 21st of June. Secretary AYUSH Ministry Vaidya Rajesh Kotecha announced that Dehradun has been selected as the venue for Mass Yoga Demonstration of International Yoga Day. Mr. Kotecha is in Dehradun to initiate the preparations regarding this mega event.
